message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

This paper deals with color transfer between images, which is a common problem in computer vision and graphics. The paper proposes a novel approach based on statistics and locally linear embedding, which is a technique commonly used in computer vision and machine learning. The paper also proposes a sketching interface for specifying color correspondences, which is a user interface problem. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). 

The paper also deals with graphics and image processing, which suggests that it could belong to cs.GR (Graphics) or cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also mentions sub-sampling as a technique to reduce computational load, which suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). 

Overall, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, and cs.AI, in that order.
